title: How I got rid of LeaveBuster
body: {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} I have bad internet and I sometimes have to leave early. When I got the LeaveBuster I hated it immediately but all I had to do was play like 5 games then bam it was gone.

replies.body:
Playing games is how you *immediately* get rid of Leaverbuster penalties. If you mean the actual system, that's not possible. Leaving games early is definitely not something I recommend, as a trend of doing so is very likely to land you back into a low-priority queue.

If you're experiencing disconnection during matches specifically due to a network disconnection or any other technical issues, let me know so we can troubleshoot it together.
I know it did take me about three days because I play Sporadically so I already knew that thank you for adding that though
